name: Swing It!
description:
Discover the power of swing. Bless your enemies and dance with them. 

Move to the beat and feel it. Your vinyl record is moving with the beat too!

  • WSAD- movin'
  • Keyboard arrows- shootin'

Programmers

  • Szymon Rzosinski
  • Szymon Skubis
  • Pawel Rzosinski

Graphic designer

  • Kamila "yreron" Chmielowiec

Music, sound design

  • Justyna "juice tea" Kryscio

Feel free to comment and submit your time!
